name: Galaxy Adventure
description:
GALAXY ADVENTURE

Galaxy Adventure is a very simple game, made by a small developer (this is my first game) and the mechanics of it are really simple.

Your main objective is basically to come back to the earth. I think is a very cool idea but, obviusly, i need your opinion so tell some ideas for the game concept in the comments.

I'm also making a multiplayer gamemode that is in development, but you can still play it with your friends so, enjoy!

NOTE: the game is work-in-progress and you can easily find a lot of bugs, don't forget to tell them in the comments!
